====Usage notes====
The {{m|en|tenon}} sense is sometimes spelled {{l|ja|柄}}. This alternate character might be considered by some to be a misspelling. Note that the right-hand element of {{l|ja|枘}} is {{l|ja|内}} without a top bar, while the right-hand element of {{l|ja|柄}} is {{l|ja|丙}} with a top bar.
